column1: Although reflexes are super-fast and just happen without you thinking about them
column2: this does not mean that they are bad. Reflexes protect you and allow you to move around without thinking about every single action and response your body needs to make. It is important that reflexes occur without the need for thinking about them because there are things that happen to your body and forces acting in your body when you move that need to be responded to very quickly. Reflexes allow your body to react in ways that help you to be safe
column4: and to be active.Imagine a typical day. You might be thinking of practicing your sport or musical instrument

column9: there are also reflexes that you are unaware of happening inside your body. These reflexes are built naturally into the body
column10: and they exist at birth and change as we grow older. Reflexes are kind of like safety features for survival that allow us to move in response to something in the environment.
